Type Method# buildBlock(_:_:_:_:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
static func buildBlock<R0, R1, R2, R3>(
    _ r0: R0,
    _ r1: R1,
    _ r2: R2,
    _ r3: R3
) -> some ResolverSpecification where R0 : Resolver, R1 : Resolver, R2 : Resolver, R3 : Resolver
```
